citeinfo.title: Nitrogen concentration and isotope dataset for environmental samples from 2012 and 2013, Barrow, Alaska

descript.abstract: Dataset includes nitrate concentrations for polygonal active layer samples, snowmelt; ammonium concentrations for active layer samples; nitrate isotopes for active layer samples, snowmelt, permafrost; ammonium isotopes for active layer samples; and nitrogen isotopes for soils and dissolved organic nitrogen extracted from soil pore waters. http://dx.doi.org/10.5440/1179130

dataqual.logic: Our data is consistent with values reported in the literature.
dataqual.complete: Some of the samples only have nitrate or ammonium concentrations (not isotopes) because when concentrations are low, we need a larger sample volume to measure isotopes. Isotope values are provided for samples with high enough concentrations and sample volume.

procstep.procdesc: Samples were processed and analyzed after collection during 2012 and 2013.
